statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data_trends;
SELECT sales_amount, revenue_amount FROM financial_data_trends ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data_trends WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT id, sales_amount FROM financial_data_trends WHERE revenue_amount < 5000;
SELECT MAX(sales_amount), MIN(revenue_amount) FROM financial_data_trends;
SELECT id, sales_amount, revenue_amount FROM financial_data_trends WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT id, sales_amount, revenue_amount FROM financial_data_trends WHERE revenue_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT sales_amount, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM financial_data_trends GROUP BY sales_amount HAVING total_revenue > 5000;
SELECT id, sales_amount, revenue_amount FROM financial_data_trends WHERE sales_amount < 500 OR revenue_amount > 3000 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT MAX(sales_amount) AS max_sales, MIN(revenue_amount) AS min_revenue FROM financial_data_trends;
SELECT * FROM Sales
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 100
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Revenue WHERE total_revenue < 5000
SELECT month_year, total_revenue FROM Revenue ORDER BY total_revenue ASC
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE product_name LIKE '%pencils%' AND sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC, sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM Sales GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT month_year, SUM(total_revenue) AS total_monthly_revenue FROM Revenue GROUP BY month_year HAVING SUM(total_revenue) > 50000 ORDER BY total_monthly_revenue DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, total_amount FROM sales;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT transaction_id, revenue_amount, transaction_date FROM revenue;
SELECT quantity, sale_date FROM sales WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM sales WHERE total_amount > 100);
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, total_amount ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 AND total_amount < 1000
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT revenue.transaction_id, SUM(revenue.revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue INNER JOIN sales ON revenue.transaction_id = sales.id GROUP BY revenue.transaction_id HAVING total_revenue > 500
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT product_name, category FROM product WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing')
SELECT * FROM revenue ORDER BY revenue_date ASC
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, revenue_amount FROM revenue WHERE product_name = 'Shoes' ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customer JOIN sales ON customer.customer_id = sales.customer_id WHERE sale_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND unit_price > 500
SELECT revenue.revenue_amount, sales.sale_date FROM revenue INNER JOIN sales ON revenue.sale_id = sales.sale_id AND revenue.revenue_amount > 1000
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id AND orders.order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'

SELECT products.product_name, sales.sale_amount, customers.customer_name FROM products INNER JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id INNER JOIN customers ON sales.customer_id = customers.customer_id
